text: Khea hela nan ca tham cea wa mi xari bang thi thuk xnumati kæ phwk khea cng klaw theid thi thuk xnumati phæ wk cea nan khux sing di «thanghlay læa brrda satw sahrab la neuxthi phwk cea fuksxn man phwk cea cng briphokh cak sing thi man cab ma hı kæ phwk cea læa cng klaw phranam khx ngxallxh bn man seiy kxn læa cng klaw ke rng xallxh theid thæ cring xallxh nan pen phuthrng rwdrew nı kar chara sxbswn
